response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to sell this item to you at a price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between ensuring a fair return for myself and providing you with a chance to secure a valuable asset at a premium yet reasonable cost. I trust that this proposal will be favorable to both parties and look forward to your positive response. If you have any inquiries or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
